Message:
My wish came true,
and I was saved.

Right now I can keep
his power at bay,
but when he eventually
makes his return,
the end of the world
will be on my hands...

I would have to go deep into
the underworld and find
the demons’ throne.
To seal the demon lord away...
Or, to kill all that remains of me.

If only I’d been oblivious
to everything,
then I could’ve easily
saved the world.

But one day,
I’ll be at the end
of my rope.

When that happens,
can I hang on to
being myself...?

Once I’m there at
the demons’ throne,
what is it that
I’ll wish for...?
